panels.description: Total number of graph items: node, relationships, ...
panels.title: Counters of Graph Items

panels.description:
Active Transactions - Read and Write - 
and Peak concurrent
panels.title: Active Transactions

panels.description: The total number of Bolt connections currently being executed.
panels.title: Bolt Connections Running

panels.description: Neo4j caches 1000 plans by default. Seeing sustained replanning events or large spikes could indicate an issue that needs to be investigated.
panels.title: Cypher Replan Events

panels.description: The total number of page faults happened in the page cache
panels.title: Page Cache Total Faults

panels.description: Performance relies on efficiently using the page cache, so this metric should be in the 98-100% range consistently. If it is much lower than that, then the database is going to disk too often.
panels.title: Pagecache Hit Ratio

panels.description: This metric shows what percentage of the allocated page cache is actually being used. If it is 100%, then it is likely that the hitratio will start dropping, and you should consider allocating more RAM to page cache.
panels.title: Page Cache Usage Ratio
